title: Endor: WebAssembly-Based Server in the Browser
author: B Cameron Gain
description: Endor enables WebAssembly’s various capabilities and individual services to now be combined into a structured environment entirely within the browser.
cntitle: Endor：基于 WebAssembly 的浏览器内服务器
cndescription: Endor 使得 WebAssembly 的各种功能和单个服务现在可以组合到一个完全在浏览器中的结构化环境中。
